      • generateVerifier

        public static Pair<String,byte[]> generateVerifier(String username,
                                                   String password,
                                                   SecureRandom random,
                                                   SecurityUtil.SRPGroupParameter params)
        Generate Secure Remote Password (SRP)
        Parameters:
        username - user name (aka "identity")
        password - password
        random - the source of randomness for this generator
        params - group parameters (prime, generator)
        Returns:
        generated verifier and random

      • checkMutualVerification

        public static boolean checkMutualVerification(String username,
                                              String password,
                                              Pair<String,byte[]> verification,
                                              SecureRandom random,
                                              SecurityUtil.SRPGroupParameter params)
                                       throws org.bouncycastle.crypto.CryptoException
        Verifies the client and server secret.
        Parameters:
        username - user name (aka "identity")
        password - password
        verification -
        random - the source of randomness for this generator
        params - group parameters (prime, generator)
        Returns:
        true if client and server secret is equals
        Throws:
        org.bouncycastle.crypto.CryptoException - If client or server's credentials are invalid

      • loadClass

        public static Class<?> loadClass(String className,
                                 Class<?> callingClass)
                          throws ClassNotFoundException
        Load a class with a given name.

        It will try to load the class in the following order:

        • From Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader()
        • Using the basic Class.forName()
        • From SecurityUtil.class.getClassLoader()
        • From the callingClass.getClassLoader()
        Parameters:
        className - The name of the class to load
        callingClass - The Class object of the calling object
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the class cannot be found anywhere.
